attributes.action: Have Mental health issues a compulsory topic to be learnt by children ages 10+
attributes.additional_details:
1 in 10 people aged 5-16 suffer with mental health disorders 
however it is not talked about enough in schools as there is a stigma behind it and it is quite a taboo subject that isn't spoke about
attributes.background: Mental health issues aren't taught or spoke about enough especially to young people and this needs to be changed
